text: Cabaret is an American musical movie. It was directed by Bob Fosse. The movie was released by Allied Artists on February 13, 1972. Cabaret was the first ever movie to be rated PG by the MPAA. In 1995, Cabaret was selected by the United States National Film Registry. == Cast == * Liza Minnelli as Sally Bowles * Michael York as Brian Roberts * Joel Grey as Master of Ceremonies == Other websites == * Cabaret on IMDb * Cabaret on Rotten Tomatoes Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:1972 LGBT movies Category:1970s American musical movies Category:Movies directed by Bob Fosse Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:American LGBT movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Berlin Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:United States National Film Registry movies Category:1970s historical movies Category:1972 drama movies Category:1970s American drama movies
title: Cabaret (1972 movie)
